name: Icaru
description:
Icaru is an action 3d platformer were you play as dragon human half-breed whose trying to escape the Sky Isles, a group of floating islands populated by the undead.

Controls:

Move - WASD

Jump - Space Bar

Short Attack - Left Click

Long Attack - Right Click

Dodge - Shift

Pause - Escape

Credits:

Character Model: Miguel Gomez

Island 3D models, castle, stair props and wind Particles: Unreal Engine Learning Kit

Enemies: UE marketplace - City of Brass

Bones: Stylized Dinosaur Bones by Horizon Studio and T-Rex Skull by loift69

Boat:  ConradJustin (https://skfb.ly/6ZK86) 

"Alien Enemy" : CGtrader - polys

VFX:

Unreal Engine Marketplace - Sevarog

SFX: 

respawn: breviceps__short-choi

Wings: ani-music__wing-flap-flag-flapping-2a

Poof: timbre__magic-poof-remix-of-badoink-s-freesound

LifePoints: Coin_SFX_Listener4me

Waterfall: ninafoletti__river-waterfall-2, deleted-user-7146007__huge-waterfall and nox-sound_Damien_Combe___ambiance-waterfall-loop-04.

Explosions: zangrutz__bomb-small, newlocknew__pop-down-impact-5-10lrs-mltprcssng and newlocknew__pop-down-impact-4-9lrs-mltprcssng.

Hits: silverillusionist__massive-hammer-hit, moogy73__woosh, zapsplat_cartoon_punch_006_17904, sypherzent__cut-through-armor-slice-clang and pfranzen__tossing-a-thing-at-someone.

Enemy Grunts: bigmonmulgrew__zombie-grun, mrh4hn zombie-grunt, tonsil5__zombie-hit-1 and tomronaldmusic__defeated-hellpig.

Ambient: rucisko__windy-forest-01 and fission9__polar-wind.

Background Music: Bensound
